resources.string: Are you sure deleting the user:
The current password is not correct!
Incorrect values. Please try again with another username or password
Congratulations! You\'ve won the game.\nDo you want to play again?

"Memory is a game that consists in finding all the paired cards of the table."
 "It starts with all cards facing down, and we turn one, and try to guess where's it's pair." "If we fail, it turns down again, and we continue looking for paired cards."

For more information, visit:
 Wikipedia .

"Hi, if you are the administrator, please proceed carefully, if not, just abandon the register screen."\n "In this screen you'll be able to register users, just introducing it's" Name,address,username and password"."\n "Before registering, you'll be able to decide if you want that the user starts with the tutorial (active by default)."

"This is not a normal calculator."

 "... Okay, it is, but not just it:"
 "This calculator will allow us to call too."
 "Try to press the call button and discover it yourself!"
Here we can see the Memory ranking of all players that have played in this device.

"This music player will let us:"


-Forward: "Get the audio to the beginning again"
 -Play/Pause: "Allows to pause the reproduction and play it again where you paused it"
 -Stop: "Stops the audio and gets it to the beginning again"
 -Loop: "Activates the "Loop" mode, so when the audio ends, it start again"

"This is an application for the JEDI course of January 2016."


"Through it, we'll try to demonstrate the acknowledgement and the Android level acquired in this course and the interest of the student.
Through the menu you'll be able to access to:"


-Memory: "The typical game where you'll have to demonstrate your memory habilities with turned cards."
 "For more information and game rules please see the game help."


-Ranking: "This section will allow us to access to the game ranking where we will be able to see the results of all users registered in this device."


-Calculator: "In this section we can access to a convencional calculator that also will allow us to call through our cell phone SIM."


-Account: "Here we'll be able to access the settings and logout."


To access the settings, "we'll also be able to click on our profile picture on the menu header."

"In settings we'll be able to see all our personal information and verify it."
 "In case of mistake or some old data, talk with the administrator to modify it."


The Logout button will allow you to logout so anybody can access your account or your personal information.
The resut is not a NaN (Not a Number)!
Welcome to Memory\nChoose the size and a deck of cards
